story.title: The Story That Changed Everything
content: Our client was a successful luxury builder doing about $12M per year, but like most, he was stuck in the referral trap. Getting 2-3 leads per week on a good week, constantly wondering where the next project would come from.
Within 30 days of launching our Luxury Client Pipeline™, something unprecedented happened: 3 qualified appointments in a single day—more than he usually got in an entire week.

After seeing how effective our approach was, the client wanted to keep this unfair advantage exclusive to their company. But we couldn't keep something so valuable hidden away from other builders who desperately needed it.
Despite the incredible results we delivered, the client chose to end our engagement rather than allow us to help other luxury builders. Their loss is now your opportunity.
story.conclusion: That's why we now guarantee territory exclusivity—as long as you're an active partner, we won't work with any other builder in your metro.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Straight answers to the questions builders ask us most

items.question: What happens if I stop working with you?
items.answer: Your territory exclusivity is tied to an active partnership. If you decide to pause or stop, your market becomes available to other builders. That way, exclusivity always rewards active partners.

items.question: Do I have to pay a retainer?
items.answer: No. Unlike traditional agencies charging $5K-$15K per month with no guarantees, we only charge a one-time setup fee to build your custom Luxury Client Pipeline™, plus a per-appointment fee for results you actually receive.

items.question: Who controls the ad spend?
items.answer: You do. All ad spend stays in your own account with full transparency. You see every dollar, and you can adjust budgets at any time.

items.question: How do you define a 'qualified appointment'?
items.answer: Appointments must meet your agreed criteria: budget ($2M+), timeline (6-18 months), location (your service area), and decision-maker status. If they don't meet those, you don't pay.

items.question: What if I don't close any projects?
items.answer: We back everything with our 90-Day ROI Promise. If you don't close a project within 90 days, you get 5 free appointments AND a full refund of your setup fee.

items.question: Can you work with more than one builder in my city?
items.answer: No. We only work with one builder per metro at a time. As long as you're active, you'll never compete with another client of ours in your market.

items.question: How fast can I expect results?
items.answer: Most builders start seeing qualified appointments booked within the first 2-3 weeks after launch. Some see them in the first few days, depending on market size and ad spend.
